name: SUPERCRUISE 2 Prototype A
description:
Controls:
-Mouse to move
-Left click to shoot

Web Player notes:
-This game was made to be played in full screen since it was made for desktop. It will work mostly fine, but everything will look smaller than it was meant to.
-Quit will probably not work as well as you want it to.

This is a prototype for SUPERCRUISE 2, the successor to SUPERCRUISE.

The game was designed for desktop, but was hastily compiled into WebGL partly out of curiosity.

It mostly works apart from the title breaking when switching to full screen in the web player, but that is just a cosmetic issue and fixes itself on the next scene load.

Music is a royalty free piece called "Miami Sky" and most sounds were sourced from Soniss' GDC sound packs then altered.
